1using MySql.Data.MySqlClient;
2using System;
3using System.Collections.Generic;
4using System.Data.Common;
5using System.Linq;
6using System.Text;
7using System.Threading.Tasks;
8using System.Windows;
9using MySql.Data.MySqlClient;
10
11namespace Y.AccesADades
12{
16 public class Connexio
17 {
18 private static string ip = "localhost";
19 private static string nom = "Db_y";
20 private static string user = "root";
21 private static string password = "";
22 private static int port = 3306;
23 private static MySqlConnection connection = new MySqlConnection($"Server={ip};Database={nom};Uid={user};Password={password};Port={port};");
27 public static MySqlConnection Connection
28 {
29 get { return connection; }
30 set { connection = value; }
31 }
36 public static MySqlConnection Connectar()
37 {
38 string connectionString = $"Server={ip};Database={nom};Uid={user};Password={password};Port={port};";
39 try
40 {
41 connection = new MySqlConnection(connectionString);
42 connection.Open();
43 }
44 catch (Exception ex)
45 {
46 MessageBox.Show("Error al obrir la BD: " + ex.Message);
47 }
48 return connection;
49 }
53 public static void Desconnectar()
54 {
55 if (!connection.IsDisposed)
56 {
57 connection.Close();
58 }
59 else
60 MessageBox.Show("La connexio no sha tancat pq no estava oberta");
61 }
62 }
63}
